document_data.caption: A map showing the Dragon Turtle Trail off the southwest shore of the Lake of Steam.
document_data.name: Dragon Turtle Trail
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dragon Turtle Trail''' was a small trail found near the [[Alimir Mountains]] and [[Lake of Steam]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}<ref name=EotSS.M">
document_data.Geography: The trail was found between the southeastern slopes of the Alimir Mountains and the southwestern shore of the Lake of Steam. It stretched for roughly {{SI|60|mi|k|long=yes}}, connecting the coastal cities of [[Tulmon]] in the north and [[Suldolphor]] in the south on [[Talagath's Gauntlet]].<ref name=EotSS.M"/>
document_data.Notable Locations: In addition to the two settlements, an unnamed trail branched southwest from the Dragon Turtle Trail from Tulmon.<ref name=EotSS.M"/>
